summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 1.9°C) and outside temperature (up 1.5°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 3.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 9590 lux) and cloud levels (up 325 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14996 lux), cloud levels (up 1904 m), feels like temperature (up 1.5°C), and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) when compared to today.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 713m and a high of 1594m, averaging 742.0m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and little or no wind. Light to moderate rain is forecast, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and it’s dim outside. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
